title: What about me?: young people and local government
creator_credit: TV Ed Productions, Ivan Gaal and Jeff Spencer
brief_description: Katie, a Year 12 student wants to find out more about what her Local City Council can do for her. This program follows her inquiries and shows what she discovers.
